mapper.sql:
SELECT ord.*, frn.name franchise_name, frn.registration_number franchise_registrationNumber, frn.owner_name franchise_ownerName, frn.address franchise_address, frn.address_detail franchise_addressDetail, frn.contact_number franchise_contactNumber, order_detail.id order_detail_id, order_detail.order_id order_detail_order_id, order_detail.quantity order_detail_quantity, order_detail.deliver_quantity order_detail_deliver_quantity, order_detail.status order_detail_status, order_detail.price order_detail_price, order_detail.comment order_detail_comment, prd.id order_detail_product_id, prd.name order_detail_product_name, prd.standard order_detail_product_standard, prd.sell_price order_detail_product_sell_price, SUM(st.quantity) as order_detail_product_stock, unit.id order_detail_product_unit_id, unit.name order_detail_product_unit_name, cat.id order_detail_product_category_id, cat.name order_detail_product_category_name FROM franchise_order ord LEFT JOIN franchise frn ON ord.franchise_id = frn.id LEFT JOIN franchise_order_detail order_detail ON ord.id = order_detail.order_id LEFT JOIN product prd ON order_detail.product_id = prd.id LEFT JOIN stock st ON prd.id = st.product_id LEFT JOIN view_unit unit ON prd.unit_id = unit.id LEFT JOIN view_category cat ON prd.category_id = cat.id
GROUP BY prd.id, cat.name, unit.name ORDER BY ord.write_date desc
